channel.title: Toxic-x (2007)
channel.description:
[center][img]http://i387.photobucket.com/albums/oo320/jalyn1993/TOXIC-X3.png[/img][/center] Webclient: [url=http://www.toxic-x.enjin.com/webclient]www.toxic-x.enjin.com/webclient[/url] Webpage: [url=http://www.toxic-x.enjin.com]www.toxic-x.enjin.com[/url] A little about the server:
[center]Toxic-x is based off 2007 oldschool and it is completley supply and demand server. Meaning that if you want an amulet of strength for example you will need to mine gold ore, create into a bar, get a amulet mold, get a cut ruby and a ball of wool. Or you can pick a diffrent skill and just buy it from another player. The reason this server is like that so the economy wont fail.
[u]Features[/u]: Great pvp. Great pvm amazing switches Caskets from npcs Clue scrolls Nice community Great staff Npc cliping pvp cliping correct dfs animation all spec weapons work
MINI GAMES: BARBARIAN ASSAULT DUEL ARENA BARROWS PEST CONTROL Tzharr caves(jad) Fight pits
[COLOR="#FF0000"]Bosses:[/COLOR] Godwars dungeon King black dragon Dagannonth lair Kalaphite queen Gu'tanoth Chaos elemental
Skills: All skills are 100% working![/center]
Media: [B]SOME PICTURES[/B] [IMG]http://i387.photobucket.com/albums/oo320/jalyn1993/fishing_zpsb8ccdfd4.png[/img] [IMG]http://i387.photobucket.com/albums/oo320/jalyn1993/crafting_zps3c7190e4.png[/img] [IMG]http://i387.photobucket.com/albums/oo320/jalyn1993/farming_zps973da254.png[/img] [IMG]http://i387.photobucket.com/albums/oo320/jalyn1993/agility_zpsd73d48fe.png[/img] [img]http://i387.photobucket.com/albums/oo320/jalyn1993/advertise_zps66e0a2e9.png[/img] [video=youtube;V68CaWNDXOw]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=V68CaWNDXOw&feature=youtu.be[/video]
Webclient: [url=http://www.toxic-x.enjin.com/webclient]www.toxic-x.enjin.com/webclient[/url] Webpage: [url=http://www.toxic-x.enjin.com]www.toxic-x.enjin.com[/url]

item.title: Toxic-x (2007)

item.description:
@zenix-pkers wrote:

[center][/center]
Webclient: www.toxic-x.enjin.com/webclient
Webpage: www.toxic-x.enjin.com
A little about the server:

[center]Toxic-x is based off 2007 oldschool and it is completley supply and demand server. Meaning that if you want an amulet of strength for example you
will need to mine gold ore, create into a bar, get a amulet mold, get a cut ruby and a ball of wool. Or you can pick a diffrent skill and just buy it from
another player. The reason this server is like that so the economy wont fail.

Features:
Great pvp.
Great pvm
amazing switches
Caskets from npcs
Clue scrolls
Nice community
Great staff
Npc cliping
pvp cliping
correct dfs animation
all spec weapons work

DUEL ARENA
BARROWS
